::Cinder/Mantle/Prowl::

Cinder nods, reluctantly stepping back and letting Iron Raptor handle 
Prowl. She hoped he would remember her.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Ok, we can do that. We have one of your troops in a CR; we rescued 
him from some attackers. Rubble will get him."

He looks over at Rubble, but the bot was already on his way back to 
the Element.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl groans as he's lifted up by Iron Raptor. His optics slowly come 
activate, very unfocused but functional.

"What happened?" he says weakly, one of his arms sliding around Iron 
Raptor for support. He felt like all his energy was drained out of 
him, which was pretty much the truth.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Iron Raptor only slightly noticed the sadness in the crew which 
Mantle 
> ruled, trying to keep Prowl's head from slipping to the ground.
> But she was suddenly rewarded from the strain when Prowl transformed 
back 
> into robot mode, falling onto her knees nearly in surprise and 
slipping her 
> arms around his chest.
> The first thing she did was stroke a hand over his head to see if 
the damage 
> Element had caused to his SBM had been passed on to his robot mode. 
Sighing 
> in relief that none of the damage was transfurred she looked down at 
him, 
> shaking him slightly to try and awaken him.
> She looked up at Cinder as she seemed run forward, kneeling at 
Prowl's side. 
> She saw that she was probably trying to pick him up.*
> 
> " It's ok, I got him."
> 
> * Iron Raptor looked back at Mantle as he came forward more, 
gripping Prowl 
> more tightly as she moved to ger to her feet, trying to take him 
with her.*
> 
> " Yes, as a matter of fact. You can all halp by keeping close to the 
CF, 
> there'll be a meeting shortly."
> 
>
